doc:
Sam Appel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Appel 0 Sam Appel (August 8, 1871 – June 18, 1947) was a Mexican-born American character actor of the silent and sound film eras. He appeared in forty films during his 28-year career, mostly in supporting roles. Sam_Appel ( August_8_,_1871 – June_18_,_1947 ) was a_Mexican-born_American_character_actor of the_silent_and_sound_film_eras . He appeared in forty_films during his_28-year_career , mostly_in supporting roles .
